name: You Will Fall
description:
You’re a tightrope walker. You will fall. It is inevitable. The best you can do besides just giving up is to make it as far as possible. Good thing you have this voice inside your head to always remind you of these facts.

Controls

Mouse Left-Right: Balance on the rope
W: Move faster (Makes it easier to fall)

Downloaded version recommended

Some features might not work in WebGL, also the downloaded version looks a bit nicer.

Credits

You Will Fall was made by Bobble, Yän, and Jirushi.
